cot.cot_output:
Reasoning process:
Dr. Jack Kevorkian was a pathologist who became known for his advocacy of physician-assisted suicide. He gained attention for his involvement in assisting terminally ill patients in ending their own lives. He was often referred to as "Dr. Death" and was a controversial figure in the medical community.

Answer:
Dr. Jack Kevorkian assisted terminally ill patients in ending their own lives, advocating for physician-assisted suicide.
